text: Marie Joseph Louis Adolphe Thiers ( , ; 15 April 17973 September 1877) was a French politician and historian. He was the second elected President of France, and the first President of the French Third Republic. ==Other websites== * Site listing links to the Third Republic * Page on history of French flags with brief outline of formation of the Third Republic * "The Reds' Last Stand" – about the Paris Commune on metropoleparis.com * Timeline of The Civil War in France (including the Paris Commune) Category:1797 births Category:1877 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French historians Category:Presidents of France Category:Prime ministers of France Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:Writers from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:People from Bouches-du-Rhône Category:19th-century presidents of France
title: Adolphe Thiers
